name: Oblation of the Far-North Scions
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  A blade as pure as moonlight is the compassion of a benevolent hand.  In the name of mercy, all beings offer hope for tomorrow. Even those lookingto be made whole can feel the moonlight's pristine blessing flowing beneaththeir skin. Even the smallest blessings, accumulated, can guide the piousscions immersed in them closer to the coming Elysium.  All sins and wicked thoughts are cleansed by the pristine moonlight, all tearsand suffering are necessary sacrifices — at least that is what the people whoworship the moon once firmly believed.
